general.name: window_blist
general.short: migrated from old datamodel - needs update
general.description: This file contains the full list of balkans used in the determination of the window function. The balkans consist of all the disjoint spherical polygons defined by the overlapping fields in the survey. Each spherical polygon is expressed as the intersection on the sphere of a number of "caps." See the mangle documentation for a full explanation. Because of the vast number of these polygons, the definition of the balkan is split into two files, this "window_blist" file and the corresponding window_bcaps.fits file.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description: For IDL users, the photoop utility "window_read" can be used to read in the balkan list. It can also return IDL structures expressing the balkans, by combining the blist and bcaps files. Example file: window_blist.fits

hdu1.description: For IDL users, the photoop utility "window_read" can be used to read in the balkan list. It can also return IDL structures expressing the balkans, by combining the blist and bcaps files. Example file: window_blist.fits

IBINDX.name: IBINDX
IBINDX.description: first entry for this field in the window_bindx.fits file matching the balkans to fields
IBINDX.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

NFIELD.name: NFIELD
NFIELD.description: number of fields overlapping this balkan (and corresponding number of entries in window_bindx.fits
NFIELD.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

IPRIMARY.name: IPRIMARY
IPRIMARY.description: field index (position in the window_flist.fits file) for the field we chose as "primary" within this balkan
IPRIMARY.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

ICAP.name: ICAP
ICAP.description: position of the first cap in the window_bcaps.fits file
ICAP.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

NCAPS.name: NCAPS
NCAPS.description: number of caps (they appear in order after and including "icap" in the window_bcaps.fits file
NCAPS.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

WEIGHT.name: WEIGHT
WEIGHT.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

STR.name: STR
STR.description:
solid angle of this balkan in
steradians
STR.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update
